title: What is a computer?
subtitle: Computer is a things to calculate and fo any other works
detail:
A computer is an electronic device that accepts data and processes it according to given instructions.

It is commonly used for calculating numbers, storing information, browsing the internet, creating documents, and running applications.

Computers help people work faster, more accurately, and more efficiently in daily life, education, and business.

title: What is a Flutter?
subtitle: Flutter is a tool to create a mobile application
detail:
Flutter is an open-source UI software development toolkit created by Google.

It allows developers to build beautiful, fast, and natively compiled mobile, web, and desktop applications from a single codebase.

Flutter uses widgets to create flexible and modern user interfaces.

title: What is a Dart?
subtitle: Dart is the language used in Flutter
detail:
Dart is a programming language developed by Google.

It is mainly used for building Flutter applications.

Dart is designed to be easy to learn, fast, and efficient.

It supports both object-oriented and functional programming styles and helps developers create high-performance applications.
